raw_mentions: ELISA experiments prove that the anti-H7N 9 fully-human monoclonal antibody 4E18 can be combined with hemagglutinin HA of H7N9 virus in a targeted mode, and the affinity is 4.6 multiplied by 10<sup>-9</sup>M; in the virus-infected cell model, the IC50 value was only around 63.27 uM.

Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:

The resulting structure is shown in fig. 4, and it can be seen from fig. 4 that IC50 of 4E18 is 63.27 ug/ml.
The IC50 of the 4E18 neutralizing activity was 63.27ug/ml, whereas the 2L11 and 2J17 antibodies had no neutralizing activity.
Antibody affinity detection: ... indicating a higher affinity of 4E18 for H7N9 virus with a KD of 4.6 × 10<sup>-9</sup>M.
